t: Amazon.com: New York & Company
s: New York & Company is a leading specialty manufacturer and retailer of women's fashion apparel and accessories providing women with modern, wear to work solutions that are multi-functional at affordable prices. The Company was incorporated in 1918 and has been public since 2004.

t: Amazon Go - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - As of March 2024, there are 22 store locations in the United States and 20 in the United Kingdom. Amazon Go's cashierless layout and technology, branded as "Just Walk Out", is also used in cashierless stores with other brands and inside facilities such as airports and sports venues.

t: Amazon Fresh sets foot in metro New York with latest stores
